short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 4th Office Edit allows you to open, edit and save changes to documents directly back to the 4th Office application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The 4th Office

Silo-smashing, team-building, file sharing, comment-generating, good-looking, fast-working, easy-using, collaboration-inducing technology for the modern workspace .

The 4th Office provides a limitless cloud storage space. It can be accessed anywhere on any device, Users can share, comment on and comment in any content. Seek approval and give approval and keep the files and document that your business thrives on flowing through your business.

Teams, departments or a whole company can share a The 4th Office workspace. Huddle around the content that matters and release the creativity in your business. See projects become idea labs. Add customers and contractors and break down the barriers. It's the platform for the business you want to build.

Bring together users and content on a single cloud-based workspace and see productivity accelerate. The simplest project or more complex workflows will be delivered faster and at less cost.
